sn4.1:2.1: 1. Paṭhamavagga
sn4.1:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre ajapālanigrodhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho.
sn4.1:4.3: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn4.1:4.5: Sādhu mutto vatamhi tāya anatthasaṃhitāya dukkarakārikāya.
sn4.1:4.6: Sādhu vatamhi mutto bodhiṃ samajjhagan”ti.
sn4.1:5.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4.1:6.4: suddhimaggā aparaddho”ti.
sn4.1:7.1: Atha kho bhagavā “māro ayaṃ pāpimā” iti viditvā māraṃ pāpimantaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
sn4.1:8.2: yaṃ kiñci amaraṃ tapaṃ;
sn4.1:8.4: phiyārittaṃva dhammani.
sn4.1:10.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā “jānāti maṃ bhagavā, jānāti maṃ sugato”ti, dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
